Summary: looked striaght up, saw black silent tringular craft heading nnw to sse
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Destin
There were no other sightings in Destin on or around October 28th 2013
divs: sighting detailsappx. 9:30 p.m. local time looked straight up and saw the black triangular shaped object moving across my field of view from nnw to sse ( from the area of eglin afb). the craft moved in a straight line across field of view for 10 seconds. constant dull lights on the bottom. dead silent vehicle. i've always stared at the sky my whole life and am familiar with military aircraft so i was quite thrilled to see this ufo\ new military hardware. based on the daily flight patterns of military jets taking off out of eglin, this object pretty much headed in the same direction and no jets were in pursuit of the craft.
